infotext.missiondescription.gotoclownhuskoperativ: Rescue a clown from a church outpost.
infotext.missionsuccess.gotoclownhuskoperative: A naive clown left his troupe and attempted to infiltrate [location1]. Investigate the situation.
infotext.missiondescription.huskcultinterception: Prevent a delivery of medical supplies to a coalition outpost. Intercept the church's transport ship.
infotext.missionmessage0.huskcultinterception: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.huskcultinterception: Navigate the submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.
infotext.missionfailure.huskcultinterception: The shipment has not been intercepted.
infotext.missionmessage0.huskcultinterception: The cult's scientist has been successfully eliminated. Leave the outpost to complete the mission.
infotext.missionmessage0.huskcultattack1: “Your transgressions against our church will no longer be tolerated. May you find mercy into the depths!”
infotext.missiondescription.assassinatehuskresear: An informant in the [location1] has told us a leading scientist of the church has been developping a devastating bioweapon prototype there. Kill the target and put an end to their research.
infotext.missionsuccess.assassinatehuskresearcher: The cult's scientist has been successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.assassinatehuskresearche: The cult's scientist has been successfully eliminated. Leave the outpost at once complete the mission.
infotext.missiondescription.escorthuskterrorist: Escort a number of personnel from [location1] to [location2] while ensuring their safety.
infotext.missionsuccess.escorthuskterrorist: Personnel transport successful. The husk extremist on board has been apprehended.
infotext.missionfailure.escorthuskterrorist: Escorted personnel did not safely reach their destination.
infotext.missionmessage0.escorthuskterrorist: Too many of the escorted personnel have perished at sea. The mission is a failure.
infotext.missionmessage1.escorthuskterrorist: Looks like dangerous husk extremists had secretely boarded your ship among the commoners. Check on your crew and reach [location2].
infotext.huskterroristannounce: The depths will take the unbelievers!
Those who reject the gift must drown!
Perish and be reborn as Husk!
infotext.missiondescription.jailbreak_husk: The Church of Husk has tasked you to free some of their proselytes who are being held captive.
infotext.missiondescription.huskmedicalcargo: [location2] is in dire need of medical supplies, and the church has tasked you with the delivery.
infotext.missionsuccess.huskmedicalcargo: The medical supplies have been delivered.
infotext.missionfailure.huskmedicalcargo: The supplies have not been delivered.
infotext.missiondescription.huskeggsmuggling: The church wants you to smuggle husk eggs hidden among other medical supplies to their operatives in [location2].
infotext.missionsuccess.huskeggsmuggling: The calyx extract has been delivered.
infotext.missionfailure.huskeggsmuggling: The supplies have not been delivered.
infotext.missiondescription.escorthuskvip: One of the church's researchers must be transfered to the [location2]. Ensure their safety.
infotext.missionfailure.escorthuskvip: Escorted personnel did not reach their destination.
infotext.missiondescription.slimecollection: The church of husk will pay [reward] for samples of slime bacteria. Harvest and deliver them to the [location2].
infotext.missionmessage0.slimecollection: Enough slime samples have been harvested. Head to the outpost for your reward.
infotext.missionsuccess.slimecollection: All the samples have been delivered.
infotext.missionfailure.slimecollection: You did not deliver the samples.
infotext.missiondescription.destroylair: Monsters have nested deeply into [location1] and are now spreading in the surrounding areas. Plant a nuclear device inside and blow up the place once and for all.
infotext.missionsuccess.destroylair: The lair has been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.destroylair: The lair has been destroyed. A reward will be sent by the nearby authorities.
infotext.eventtext.destroylair.reachheart: Reach the heart of the lair with the bomb
infotext.eventtext.destroylair.plantbomb: Plant the bomb near the heart
infotext.missiondescription.destroypirateoutpost: This place is a den of thieves. You're free to conduct business... but you could also rid Europa of this scum.
infotext.missionsuccess.destroypirateoutpost: You cleared the outpost of its undesirable inhabitants. Europa is a safer place now.
infotext.missionfailure.destroypirateoutpost: The pirates still remain in control of the outpost.
infotext.missionmessage0.destroypirateoutpost: You cleared the outpost of its undesirable inhabitants. Europa is a safer place now.
infotext.missiondescription.killelectricspineling: A particularly aggressive Great Electric Spineling has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to those who kill the creature.
infotext.missionsuccess.killelectricspineling1: The Great Electric Spineling has been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.killelectricspineling1: The Great Electric Spineling is dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
infotext.missiondescription.killelectricspineling: A particularly aggressive pair of Great Electric Spinelings have been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to those who kill the creatures.
infotext.missionsuccess.killelectricspineling2: The Great Electric Spinelings have been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.killelectricspineling2: The Great Electric Spinelings are dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
infotext.missiondescription.cotakeover_separatist: A garrison of separatist rebels is staying at [location1]. Eliminate them and seize the outpost for the Coalition.
infotext.missiondescription.septakeover_coalition: A garrison of coalition soldiers is staying at [location1]. Eliminate them and liberate the outpost in the name the Separatists.
infotext.missionmessage0.coalitiontakeover: Seems like the separatists are surrendering.
infotext.missionmessage0.separatisttakeover: Seems like the coalition is giving this station up.
infotext.missiondescription.coalition_cargotrap: A coalition cargo vessel is passing through. Eliminate their crew and loot their ship!
infotext.missionsuccess.coalition_cargotrap: You successfully eliminated the coalition crew!
infotext.missionfailure.coalition_cargotrap: You didn't kill the coalition crew!
infotext.missionmessage0.coalition_cargotrap: Oh no! It seems like this was a trap... It's an attack vessel!
infotext.missionmessage1.coalition_cargotrap: Loot their vessel first or continue onwards to [location2].
infotext.missiondescription.stealingintel: The Jovian Separatists have tasked you to steal classified documents from the Coalition to gain more intel on their operations.
infotext.missionsuccess.stealingintel: The documents have been successfully retrieved.
infotext.missionmessage0.stealingintel: You've found the classified documents. Best to get out of there quickly before someone notices.
infotext.missiondescription.crawlerlair1: Crawlers are nesting at [location1]. Find the heart of their lair and destroy it. We've marked all potential targets on your sonar. We need you to find the right one and plant a nuke on it. You should have one lying around somewhere. Word of advice: Only activate it once you know the shortest way back to your submarine!
infotext.missionsuccess.crawlerlair1: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.crawlerlair1: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.crawlerlair2: Crawlers are nesting at [location1]. Find the heart of their lair and destroy it. We've marked all potential targets on your sonar. We need you to find the right one and plant a nuke on it. You should have one lying around somewhere. Word of advice: Only activate it once you know the shortest way back to your submarine!
infotext.missionsuccess.crawlerlair2: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.crawlerlair2: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.crawlerlair3: Crawlers are nesting at [location1]. Find the heart of their lair and destroy it. We've marked all potential targets on your sonar. We need you to find the right one and plant a nuke on it. You should have one lying around somewhere. Word of advice: Only activate it once you know the shortest way back to your submarine!
infotext.missionsuccess.crawlerlair3: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.crawlerlair3: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.mudraptorlair1: Mudraptors are nesting at [location1]. Find the heart of their lair and destroy it. We've marked all potential targets on your sonar. We need you to find the right one and plant a nuke on it. You should have one lying around somewhere. Word of advice: Only activate it once you know the shortest way back to your submarine!
infotext.missionsuccess.mudraptorlair1: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.mudraptorlair1: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.mudraptorlair2: Mudraptors are nesting at [location1]. Find the heart of their lair and destroy it. We've marked all potential targets on your sonar. We need you to find the right one and plant a nuke on it. You should have one lying around somewhere. Word of advice: Only activate it once you know the shortest way back to your submarine!
infotext.missionsuccess.mudraptorlair2: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.mudraptorlair2: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.mudraptorlair3: Mudraptors are nesting at [location1]. Find the heart of their lair and destroy it. We've marked all potential targets on your sonar. We need you to find the right one and plant a nuke on it. You should have one lying around somewhere. Word of advice: Only activate it once you know the shortest way back to your submarine!
infotext.missionsuccess.mudraptorlair3: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.mudraptorlair3: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.thresherlair1: Threshers are nesting at [location1]. Find the heart of their lair and destroy it. We've marked all potential targets on your sonar. We need you to find the right one and plant a nuke on it. You should have one lying around somewhere. Word of advice: Only activate it once you know the shortest way back to your submarine!
infotext.missionsuccess.thresherlair1: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.thresherlair1: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.thresherlair2: Threshers are nesting at [location1]. Find the heart of their lair and destroy it. We've marked all potential targets on your sonar. We need you to find the right one and plant a nuke on it. You should have one lying around somewhere. Word of advice: Only activate it once you know the shortest way back to your submarine!
infotext.missionsuccess.thresherlair2: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.thresherlair2: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.thresherlair3: Threshers are nesting at [location1]. Help us to get rid of them by finding and destroying any of their eggs inside the cave.
infotext.missionsuccess.thresherlair3: The nests have been successfully destroyed.
infotext.missionmessage0.thresherlair3: "Great work! Seems like you succesfully destroyed every single nest in there. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.huskcrawlerlair: Husked Crawlers are spreading rapidly at [location1]. We can't let this spread further! Help us to get rid of them by eliminating every single one you can find in that cave! We've sent you something to help deal with them, check your cargo. Better place that bad boy far away!
infotext.missionsuccess.huskcrawlerlair: The husked crawlers have been successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.huskcrawlerlair: The husks have been purged. A reward will be sent by the nearby authorities.
infotext.missiondescription.wasteyard: Too many vessels found their demise at [location1] and all their toxic waste leaking into the ocean has turned the local fauna into extra dangerous creatures. We can't let them spread this infection further! Help us to get rid of them by shooting every single one and destroying every egg you can find at that wasteyard.
infotext.missionmessage0.wasteyard: "Didn't think you'd get there out alive! Seems like you got them all. Leave the area and we'll send you your pay."
infotext.missiondescription.coalition_cargo2: A coalition cargo vessel is passing through. Eliminate their crew and loot their ship!
infotext.missionsuccess.coalition_cargo2: You successfully dealt with the coalition crew!
infotext.missionfailure.coalition_cargo2: You didn't deal with the coalition crew!
infotext.missionmessage0.coalition_cargo2: Time to deal with them! They got the loot you want!
infotext.missionmessage1.coalition_cargo2: Loot their vessel and continue onwards to [location2].
infotext.missiondescription.gotorandomencounter: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.gotorandomencounter: You decided to investigate the strange alien signal.
infotext.missiondescription.random_salvageskyhold: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_salvageskyholderar: You decided to take the artifact with you. It might be worth something.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_salvageskyholdera: You investigated the signal and found an artifact.
infotext.missiondescription.random_salvagethermal: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_salvagethermalarti: You decided to take the artifact with you. It might be worth something.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_salvagethermalart: You investigated the signal and found an artifact.

infotext.missionsuccess.random_salvagethermalarti: You decided to take the artifact with you. It might be worth something.

infotext.missionsuccess.random_salvagenasonovarti: You decided to take the artifact with you. It might be worth something.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_salvagenasonovart: You investigated the signal and found an artifact.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killmoloch: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killmoloch: Signal investigated and the Moloch has been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killmoloch: Turns out the signal was coming from that Moloch.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killmolochblac: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killmolochblack: Signal investigated and the Moloch has been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killmolochblack: Turns out the signal was coming from that Moloch.

infotext.missionsuccess.random_killlargecrawler: Signal investigated and the Crawlers have been killed.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killtigerthres: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killtigerthresher: Signal investigated and the Tiger Thresher has been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killtigerthresher: Turns out the signal was coming from that Tiger Thresher.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killcrawlerbro: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killcrawlerbroodmo: Signal investigated and the Broodmother has been terminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killcrawlerbroodm: Turns out the signal was coming from that Broodmother.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killcrawlerbro: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killcrawlerbroodmo: Signal investigated and the Broodmother has been terminated.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killcrawlerbro: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killcrawlerbroodmo: Signal investigated and the Broodmother has been terminated.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killcrawlerswa: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killcrawlerswarm1: Signal investigated and the swarm has been terminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killcrawlerswarm1: Turns out the signal was coming from that swarm.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killcrawlerswa: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killcrawlerswarm1l: Signal investigated and the swarm has been terminated.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killcrawlerswa: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killcrawlerswarm1h: Signal investigated and the swarm has been terminated.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killcrawlerswa: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killcrawlerswarm2: Signal investigated and the swarm has been terminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killcrawlerswarm2: Turns out the signal was coming from that swarm.

infotext.missionsuccess.random_killhammerhead_bas: Signal investigated and the Hammerhead has been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killhammerhead_ba: Turns out the signal was coming from that Hammerhead.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killhammerhead: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killhammerhead: Signal investigated and the Hammerheads have been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killhammerhead: Turns out the signal was coming from those Hammerheads.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killhammerhead: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killhammerhead2: Signal investigated and the Hammerheads have been killed.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killhammerhead2: Turns out the signal was coming from those Hammerheads.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killmatriarch1: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killmatriarch1: Signal investigated and the Hammerheads have been neutralized. The route should be safe again.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killmatriarch1: Turns out the signal was coming from those Hammerheads.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killmatriarch2: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killmatriarch2: Signal investigated and the Matriarch has been killed. The route should be safe again.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killmatriarch2: Turns out the signal was coming from that Matriarch.

infotext.missionsuccess.random_killhammerheadgold: Signal investigated and the Golden Hammerhead is dead.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killhammerheadgol: Turns out the signal was coming from that Golden Hammerhead.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killgiantspine: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killgiantspineling: Signal investigated and the Giant Spineling is dead.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killgiantspinelin: Turns out the signal was coming from that Giant Spineling.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killgiantspine: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killgiantspineling: Signal investigated and the Giant Spineling is dead.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killspinelings: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killspinelingswarm: Signal investigated and the swarm has been terminated.

infotext.missionmessage0.random_killthresherswarm: Turns out the signal was coming from that swarm.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killthreshersw: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killthresherswarm2: Signal investigated and the swarm has been terminated.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killmudraptors: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killmudraptors_bas: Signal investigated and the Mudraptors are dead.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killmudraptors: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killmudraptors1: Signal investigated and the Mudraptors are dead.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_killmudraptors1: Turns out the signal was coming from those Mudraptors.
infotext.missiondescription.random_killmudraptors: You are picking up a strange alien signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_killmudraptors2: Signal investigated and the Mudraptors are dead.
infotext.missiondescription.random_salvagewreck1: You are picking up a distress signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_salvagewreck1: Signal investigated and the Logbook has been successfully retrieved.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_salvagewreck1: Turns out the signal was coming from that logbook containing some encrypted data.
infotext.missiondescription.random_pirate_heavy: You are picking up a distress signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_pirate_heavy: Signal investigated and the pirate vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_pirate_heavy: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.random_pirate_heavy: Turns out the signal was coming from those pirates. Maybe they got loot on board? Navigate your submarine to [location2] when you're ready to leave.
infotext.missiondescription.random_pirate_party: You are picking up a distress signal...
infotext.missionsuccess.random_pirate_party: The pirate vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.random_pirate_party: The pirate vessel's crew was not eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.random_pirate_party: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.random_pirate_party: Turns out the signal was coming from those pirates. Maybe they got loot on board? Navigate your submarine to [location2] when you're ready to leave.
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_heavy: Seek out the pirate vessel that has been terrorizing this area and eliminate its crew, but keep in mind these pirates managed to strengthen their hull so you either pack heavy firepower or aim for the doors and hatches! The marked locations show where the ship has last been sighted.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_heavy: The pirate vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_heavy: The pirate vessel's crew was not eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_heavy: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_heavy: Navigate your submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_party: There are rumors of a pirate vessel robbing submarines of their alcohol. Worse, they are blasting music so loud all of Europa's fauna is following in their wake! Sink those drunken idiots before the situation gets worse.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_party: The pirate vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_party: The pirate vessel's crew was not eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_party: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_party: Navigate your submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_piezo: We've heard rumors about a pirate vessel with strange capabilities around this area. Apparently they create some sort of anomaly to protect themselves, so you might want to keep your submarine at a safe distance! The marked locations show where we suspect the ship to be.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_piezo: The pirate vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_piezo: The pirate vessel's crew was not eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_piezo: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_piezo: Navigate your submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.
infotext.missiondescription.pirate_lord: There has been talk about a pirate lord's vessel that has been terrorizing this area. Eliminate it's crew and you'll be rewarded handsomely! But keep in mind this is a pirate lord's vessel! They have very strong hulls and pack heavy firepower so be prepared! The marked locations show where the ship has last been sighted.
infotext.missionsuccess.pirate_lord: The pirate vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
infotext.missionfailure.pirate_lord: The pirate vessel's crew was not eliminated.
infotext.missionmessage0.pirate_lord: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
infotext.missionmessage1.pirate_lord: Navigate your submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.
infotext.missiondescription.surveyedminerals: The survey drone has located [resourcename1] and [resourcename2] on the way to [location2].
infotext.missionmessage0.surveyedminerals: That should be all of the surveyed minerals.
infotext.missionsuccess.surveyedminerals: You have mined all of the [resourcename1] and [resourcename2] deposits.
infotext.missiondescription.vipnapping: A wealthy executive is conducting business in [location1]. Drag him to your submarine alive and escape the station.
infotext.eventtext.escortransom.findbeacon: Drop off the VIP at a beacon station. Alive.
infotext.missiondescription.livecapture: Multiple test subjects have escaped from [location2], and the church has tasked you with recovering a specimen alive.
infotext.missionmessage0.livecapture: Keep the target alive until you reach [location2].
infotext.missionmessage1.livecapture: Navigate the submarine to [location2] and keep the target alive.
infotext.missionsuccess.livecapture: The specimen has been successfully captured and transported to destination.
infotext.missionfailure.livecapture: Failed to retrieve the specimen alive.
infotext.missionname.escortmedivac: Escort a patient to a medical facility
infotext.missiondescription.escortmedivac: A resident of [location1] has contracted an unknown illness, and needs to be transported to [location2] for immediate treatment before the disease spreads.
infotext.missionmessage0.escortmedivac: The patient did not survive transport. The mission is a failure.
infotext.missionsuccess.escortmedivac: Medical facility reached. The patient has been taken into urgent care.
infotext.missionfailure.escortmedivac: The patient did not reach their destination.
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_retrieveindustria: “A transport vessel has been illegally dumping barrels of dangerous industrial waste in the waters nearby. If we don't do something, they will contaminate the water and make the passage unsafe. We'll pay anyone for cleaning up the cave and properly disposing of the waste in a nearby outpost”
infotext.missiondescription.retrieveindustrialwas: Irradiated industrial waste was dumped by unscrupulous captains between [location1] and [location2], and is now polluting the area. Retrieve the waste and bring it to a nearby outpost for safe disposal.
infotext.missionsuccess.retrieveindustrialwaste: The waste has been successfully retrieved.
infotext.missionmessage.retrieveindustrialwaste.a: The barrels of waste have been retrieved. Bring them to [location2] to be processed safely.
infotext.missionmessage.retrieveindustrialwaste.p: Some of the waste barrels are now on board the sub, but there is still more to retrieve.
infotext.missionmessage.retrieveindustrialwaste.t: Bring the waste back on board, but beware of its high dangerosity.
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_industrialinciden: A stressed out worker grabs your attention. "We've received a message from a nearby industrial outpost. Apparently they're short on labor and are overworking the machinery to meet production quotas. We have our hands full over here, but if you have extra manpower to spare, try and give them technical assistance. Some extra elbow grease wouldn't hurt...”
“We might swing by the place, but no promises.”
infotext.missiondescription.industrialincident: [location1] has trouble meeting its production quota, and the station workers are overwhelmed. See if you can help with the situation.
infotext.missionsuccess.industrialincident: The station has been repaired and is functional again.
infotext.missionfailure.industrialincident: You didn't help repair the station.
infotext.missionmessage0.industrialincident: You hear screams around the station. A large fire has broken out and the station is erupting into chaos. Repair it!
infotext.eventtext.industrialincidentevent.succes: You've managed to repair the broken machinery. The outpost is functional again, although a little singed.
infotext.eventtext.outpostdestruction.npcsflee: You hear multiple docking ports disengaging as the remaining inhabitants of the station made their escape, leaving it abandoned.
infotext.eventtext.outpostdestruction.placeruined: This place now lies in ruins...
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_escortorangeboys: “A nearby habitation outpost has ordered a special delivery of fresh meat. We need someone to safely escort a pack of Orange Boys to the destination.”
“Sure. They're so cute... and so delicious.”
infotext.missiondescription.escortorangeboys: [location2] has requested a delivery of fresh Orange Boy meat and you've been tasked with herding them to destination.
infotext.missionsuccess.escortorangeboys: Most of the Orange Boys have been safely transported to destination.
infotext.missionfailure.escortorangeboys: Failed to transport Orange Boys to destination.
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_keepwetcargo: “We're looking for a submarine to transport biological samples that have rare medical properties. Be very careful, they are fragile and need special attention.”
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_keepwetcargo.acce: “Unknown biological substances aboard my ship? Sure!”
infotext.missiondescription.keepwetcargo: A colony of alien organisms must be transported to [location2] using a special container. Make sure the crate is powered and remains underwater at all times.
infotext.missionmessage0.keepwetcargo: The organisms did not survive transport.
infotext.missionsuccess.keepwetcargo: The organisms have been transported safely.
infotext.missionfailure.keepwetcargo: Failed to transport the cargo to destination.
infotext.entitydescription.biocrate: A large colony of alien organisms that needs a special filtration system to survive. Must be kept powered and wet at all times.
infotext.missiondescription.silencewitness: An escaped member of the Red Mantis gang has been taken into custody inside a coalition outpost and is threatening to reveal secrets about the organisation. Silence the witness, permanently...
infotext.missiondescription.hostagesituation: A coalition station has been taken hostage by a gang of bandits who are asking for a ransom. Try to resolve the situation without harming the hostages; some losses are tolerated.
infotext.missionsuccess.hostagesituation: The hostages have been rescued successfully.
infotext.missionfailure.hostagesituation: The hostages have not been rescued.
infotext.missionmessage0.hostagesituation: The bandits have been dealt with. Make sure the hostages are safe.
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_cargodefensebots: “We've got a shipment of brand new defense bot models ready to be sent to a nearby outpost. They're fragile, so make sure to performance maintenance on them and keep the humidity away.”
infotext.missiondescription.cargodefensebots: A shipment of inactive defense bots must be transported to [location2]. Keep the defense bots repaired.
infotext.missionmessage0.cargodefensebots: The defense bots broke during transport.
infotext.missionsuccess.cargodefensebots: The defense bots have been transported safely.
infotext.missionfailure.cargodefensebots: Failed to transport the cargo to destination.
infotext.missionmessage0.cargodefensebots_defecti: Too many defense bots broke during transport.
infotext.missionsuccess.cargodefensebots_defectiv: Despite a minor malfunction, the defense bots have been transported safely.
infotext.missionfailure.cargodefensebots_defectiv: Failed to transport the cargo to destination.
infotext.entitydescription.cargodefensebot: An inactive defense bot that needs to be transported to destination. Needs regular maintenance.
infotext.EventText.missionevent_chimerasamples.re: You've overheard the head scientist of this outpost is looking for a well-armed vessel. "So you've come to help in our research, traveller. I have a mission that requires an adventurous spirit."
infotext.EventText.missionevent_chimerasamples.ne: “The almighty husk is ever changing, taking new forms and unifying all life. We have baptized such organisms Chimeras. To further study this new biological construct, we need blood samples, extracted from a subject."
infotext.EventText.missionevent_chimerasamples.wo: "You're saying it can get even WORSE?"
infotext.EventText.missionevent_chimerasamples.gi: The scientist hands you a vial with a needle. “Plunge this spike into the heart of the Chimera until the receptacle is full, then bring the container to a safe destination.”
infotext.entitydescription.husksamplevial: Use this vial to gather a blood sample from on the target subject.
infotext.missionname.chimerasamples: Gather a sample of Chimera blood
infotext.missiondescription.chimerasamples: The church of the Husk has tasked you with collecting a sample of blood from a Husk Chimera. Extreme caution is advised.
infotext.missionmessage0.chimerasamples: Do not lose the samples until you reach [location2].
infotext.missionsuccess.chimerasamples: The chimera blood samples have been secured.
infotext.missionfailure.chimerasamples: Failed to retrieve the blood samples.
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_retrievehammerhea: “A passing ship has spotted Hammerhead younglings nearby, meaning they might be feeding on fresh mucus in the area. This substance has strong medicinal properties, so we'll pay if you manage to retrieve at least one sample of it. Be careful though, it breaks apart easily.”
infotext.missiondescription.retrievehammerheadmuc: A shoal of hammerhead hatchlings has been spotted between [location1] and [location2], probably feeding off fresh mucus. Find and retrieve at least one mucus ball sample and be careful to not destroy it.
infotext.missionsuccess.retrievehammerheadmucus: A mucus sample has been successfully retrieved.
infotext.missionfailure.retrievehammerheadmucus: Failed to retrieve a mucus sample.
infotext.missionmessage.retrievehammerheadmucus.a: You've recovered a mucus sample. Bring at least one back for payment.
infotext.missionmessage.retrievehammerheadmucus.p: You've recovered a mucus sample, but there might still be more around.
infotext.missionmessage.retrievehammerheadmucus.t: Bring the mucus on board, and be careful not to destroy it.
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_alcoholcontraband: Interested in making a quick buck? We've been distributing our special brand of homebrewed liquor all around the ocean. Unfortunately the authorities don't like their workers drinking themselves blind, so we have to smuggle the thing using inconspicuous crews, like yours... If you can take this crate to a nearby outpost, you'll get rewarded handsomely.
“Don't drink yourself blind on the way, we'll only pay if the entire shipment makes it to destination.”
infotext.missiondescription.alcoholcontraband: You've been tasked to smuggle 10 bottles of illegal alcohol to a bar at [location1]. Make sure security doesnt get its hands on it.
infotext.missionmessage0.alcoholcontraband: Find the local bartender and bring the shipment over without it being seized by security.
infotext.eventtext.alcoholcontrabandevent.success: You've delivered the contraband to the outpost. Liquor will flow.
infotext.eventtext.alcoholcontrabandevent.bartend: You find the station's bartender. Looks like he's been craving the bottle for a while. "Do you have the good stuff? I can almost taste it..."
infotext.eventtext.alcoholcontrabandevent.thirsty: The bartender takes a sip, then chugs an entire bottle down. "Just as I remembered!"
infotext.eventtext.alcoholcontrabandevent.nogoods: "What now? No money until you bring me all of the goods."
infotext.eventtext.missionevent_destroybigalientu: “Some reckless researchers accidentally triggered a mechanism when exploring a nearby ruin. As a result, they powered a dangerous alien weapon that is now shooting at passing ships! Someone needs to destroy it for good.”
“Make sure you have strong explosives and a good ship. Reports say that it is protected by a shield.”
infotext.missiondescription.destroybigalienturret: A reactivated piece of alien artillery is shooting at passing ships. It is protected by a powerful shield: you will need to locate it and plant explosives directly inside the turret to destroy it.
infotext.missionsuccess.destroybigalienturret: The ancient artillery has been destroyed and ships can now travel safely.
infotext.missionfailure.destroybigalienturret: Failed to destroy the alien artillery.
infotext.missionmessage0.destroybigalienturret: The ancient artillery has been destroyed and ships can now travel safely.
infotext.missiondescription.retrievesecretdocumen: You've been tasked with retrieving secret documents from a VIP currently staying in [location]. The documents should be inside a secure briefcase. You need to find a way to open the lock.
infotext.EventObjective.stowaway2.escort: Escort the stowaway to the nearest outpost
infotext.EventDescription.stowaway2.snuckin: As you were loading cargo, a stowaway snuck onto your submarine. Drop them off at the nearest station.
infotext.EventDescription.stowaway2.Success: The stowaway has been safely escorted to the outpost. They are grateful, and a little scared.
infotext.EventDescription.stowaway2.Failure: The stowaway died in transit. Only qualified seamen truly belong on a submarine...
